TopicTitle: Saying thanks to KSP for the inspiration it's brought.

Articles.Content:
It's been years since I've properly been on these forums, and I don't think that many people here will remember me. It was a good time, and an important time for me to further my knowledge of Space and science in general.

I'm making this post because I want to say thanks to KSP for installing in me a love of flying and engineering. Though those things were always a part of me, KSP brought out an interest in flight that no other game had truly captivated me with. I've come a long way since I first started playing in 2014. Funny to think it's been more than half a decade.

This is a video I recently made of my recent advances in my flight adventures. I have to add another thank you credit to KSP for inspiring me to first start making videos, too.

All the best, everyone.
